name: Monitoring engineer (SRE)
description:
We are looking for an experienced Monitoring Engineer to work in the Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) department. The Monitoring Engineer will be responsible for ensuring the availability, performance and scalability of our systems by designing, implementing and maintaining monitoring solutions.

What you will do:

  • Design, develop and support monitoring solutions to ensure systems availability, performance and scalability;
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve root causes of problems;
  • Develop and maintain documentation related to monitoring solutions and processes;

What we expect:

  • Experience developing, implementing and supporting monitoring solutions for 3 years or more;
  • Confident knowledge of monitoring tools such as Prometheus, Grafana, Zabbix, Nagios, Graylog;
  • Experience with scripting languages such as Python, Bash or similar;
  • Good understanding of networking concepts and protocols (TCP/IP, HTTP, DNS, etc.);
  • Experience with Linux operating systems;
  • Fluent English, both spoken and written;
  • Experience with PHP will be an advantage.

Terms:

  • Working on long-term product development;
  • Working on large and complex systems;
  • Working on the principles of agile;
  • Ongoing training and personal growth.


Compensation package:

  • Health insurance reimbursement;
  • English classes;
  • Massage;
  • Compensation for sports activities;
  • Financial assistance for significant events in the life of employees.
